Paragraph: Thiophene is a simple and fundamental block to construct new D-A type copolymers.

(Note: I have included "D-A type copolymers" as a "Material Name" because it is a type of copolymer, and the context suggests that it is being referred to as a material. However, it is possible that "D-A type" is an abbreviation for a specific type of copolymer, in which case "D-A type copolymers" would not be a valid material name on its own. Without further context, I have included it as a valid material name.)
